Name: Sunrise 7
About the game: 'You are a shadow. Run to escape the Sunrise!' Sunrise 7 is a 2D platforming adventure with a substantial difficulty level. Random upgrades and procedurally generated areas make each playthrough a new experience! In Sunrise 7 , a shadow awakens during the night, and must run to find shelter before the Sun rises! Powerful enemies and difficult challenges await in areas with unique themes and obstacles. Absorb shade and choose specific abilities to level up and become strong enough to take on intense foes. Discover the world's secrets, and fight to defeat the Sunlight! Procedurally Generated Areas and Puzzles Exciting Boss Fights Rewarding Optional Challenges
Meta Title: Sunrise 7: Mar 27, 2020, Ryan Wheeler and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Sunrise 7? Check out the release date (Mar 27, 2020), developer insights from Ryan Wheeler, and a complete game summary.
